name: Any AI
description: A multi-provider, bring-your-own-key AI assistant for MentraOS smart glasses. Forked from Mentra AI 2 app
onboardingInstructions:
1. Add [any] AI as a background App. Make sure you remove the Mentra AI app from background apps so you don't have Any AI and Mentra AI running simultaneously.
2. Tap Background Apps, then tap the [any] AI card to open the webview.
3. Tap the gear icon to open Settings, then configure your AI provider, model, and API key.
4. Enjoy!

permissions.description: Access to microphone for voice input and audio processing
